0: RESOLUTION URGING MRS. JANET NAPOLES, THE ALLEGED MASTERMIND OF THE PORK BARREL SCAM, TO DISCLOSE TO THE PUBLIC ONCE AND FOR ALL THE NAMES OF ALL PERSONALITIES, PUBLIC OR PRIVATE, WHOM SHE DEALT WITH IN THE MULTI-BILLION PESO PUBLIC FUND SCANDAL
